channel.title: Got a problem with runserver.bat , help me out , thanks
channel.description:
Guyss ive been running for 2 days an server , i enjoyed it
but after 2 days i compiled and runserver.bat again then i tried 2 join my server again but then it just wont work i cant login
then i tried again few times but i cant login i checked ip etc well few hours later i tried it again but when i pressed runserver.bat the program coems for like 0.1 second and then just floats away !!
i almsot cant c it but i click it & then jsut float away :(
Can anyone help me out ?
Thanks , Fervan
i really apreciate it that ehh wtf how do i write apreciate ? :P
that ehh if someone can help me out :)

make this ur runserver

@echo off
TITLE Run
java -cp .;./jython.jar -Xmx1024m server
pause
